name: Adventure Medical Kits UltraLight .5 First Aid Kit
description: A small, light, and compact first aid kit designed for one person travelling for up to two days. The tough, simple, and lightweight outer bag is made of 1.3oz. silicone coated ripstop nylon. A unique feature of the Adventure medical kits is the Aloksak® inner bag. This inner bag serves as an added layer of weather protection for the kit, providing a leak-proof, waterproof, and airtight seal. The inner package is waterproof to 200 feet.Dimensions are 15 x 13 x 2.5cm.Please note that MEC sells the International version of this kit. Contents may vary slightly from the US versions described on the vendor's website.
